title: Polynomial Functions - Rewriting and Solving - Part B

content.description:
Directions:

Unless otherwise specified, the domain of a function <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>f</mi> </math> is assumed to be the set of all real numbers <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>x</mi> </math> for which <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>f</mi> <mtext> </mtext> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPjMCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9frFj0=OqFL0dbba9LqpC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=xfr=xfrpeWZqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaiaadAgacaaMi8UaaiikaiaadIhacaGGPaaaaa@3B1B@</annotation> </semantics> </math> is a real number.

Solutions to equations must be real numbers. Determine the exact value of any expression that can be obtained without a calculator.

Unless otherwise specified, combine terms using algebraic methods and rules for exponents and logarithms, where applicable. For example, <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mn>2</mn> <mi>x</mi> <mo>+</mo> <mn>3</mn> <mi>x</mi> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPjMCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9frFj0=OqFL0dbba9LqpC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=xfr=xfrpeWZqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaiaaikdacaWG4bGaey4kaSIaaG4maiaadIhaaaa@3A9E@</annotation> </semantics> </math>, <math> <semantics> <mrow> <msup> <mn>5</mn> <mn>2</mn> </msup> <mo>⋅</mo> <msup> <mn>5</mn> <mn>3</mn> </msup> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3BEE@</annotation> </semantics> </math>, and <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mfrac> <mrow> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>5</mn> </msup> </mrow> <mrow> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> </mrow> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3A32@</annotation> </semantics> </math> should be rewritten in equivalent forms.

For each part of the question, show the work that leads to your answers.
content.question:
Part B

The function <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>k</mi> </math> is given by <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>k</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> <mo>−</mo><mn>19</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>14</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4310@</annotation> </semantics> </math>. Find all values of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>x</mi> </math> for which <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>k</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPjMCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9frFj0=OqFL0dbba9LqpC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=xfr=xfrpeWZqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaiaadUgacaGGOaGaamiEaiaacMcacqGH+aGpcaaIWaaaaa@3B51@</annotation> </semantics> </math>.

frqParts.text:
Part B

The function <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>k</mi> </math> is given by <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>k</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> <mo>−</mo><mn>19</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>14</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4310@</annotation> </semantics> </math>. Find all values of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"> <mi>x</mi> </math> for which <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>k</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPjMCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaacH8Xr=y0tbbg9q8qqaqpepec8Eeeq0tXdbba9frFj0=OqFL0dbba9LqpC0db9Fve9pce9v8qqaq=dir=xirpG0tb9fr=xfr=xfrpeWZqaaeaabiGaciaacaqabeaadaqaaqaaaOqaaiaadUgacaGGOaGaamiEaiaacMcacqGH+aGpcaaIWaaaaa@3B51@</annotation> </semantics> </math>.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Solve equations and inequalities represented analytically, with and without technology.
